description.message: Restore, filter or remove recently closed tabs, windows and history including those from other devices.
description.description: Short description of extension's purpose displayed in browser's extension manager

popup_history_manager.description: Tool-tip of a 'clock' button leading to history manager

popup_recently_closed_tabs.description: Label of separator over the list of recently closed tabs on the main page of the popup

popup_recent_history.description: Label of separator over the list of recently viewed pages on the main page of the popup

popup_other_devices.description: Tool-tip of a 'right arrow' button leading to a list of synchronized devices and tabs opened on them

popup_options.description: Tool-tip of a hamburger button opening extension's settings page

popup_back.description: Tool-tip of a left arrow button leading back to the main popup page

popup_window.description: Displayed when showing closed window, ex: Window (Number of tabs: 7)

popup_number_of_tabs.description: Displayed when showing closed window, ex: Window (Number of tabs: 7)

results_recently.description: Separator over recent search results (last hour)

results_today.description: Separator over search results spanning between last hour and last 24 hours

results_yesterday.description: Separator over search results spanning between last 24 hours and last 48 hours

results_this_week.description: Separator over search results spanning between last 48 hours and last 7 days

results_last_week.description: Separator over search results between last 7 and 14 days7 and 14 days7 and 14 days7 and 14 days7 and 14 days7 and 14 days7 and 14 days

results_this_month.description: Separator over search results between last 14 and 28 days

results_last_month.description: Separator over search results between last 28 and 56 days

results_nothing_found.description: Message shown when no search results were found, and on the main page, if history has been cleared

options_display.description: Label of the Display section of options page

options_behavior.description: Label of the Behavior section of options page

options_other.description: Label of the Miscellaneous section of options page

options_height.description: Label of popup height slider of the options page

options_width.description: Label of popup width slider of the options page

options_tabs_first.description: Label of check-box switching display order of main page entries of the options page

options_sync.description: Label of check-box enabling settings synchronization with the cloud

options_reset.description: Label of a button used to reset settings to factory defaults of the options page

icon_color.description: Label of a select field for switching color of the extension icon

granite.description: Granite Icon color (color select field of the options menu)

white.description: White Icon color (color select field of the options menu)

red.description: Red Icon color (color select field of the options menu)

green.description: Green Icon color (color select field of the options menu)

blue.description: Blue Icon color (color select field of the options menu

options_timer.description: Label of a check-box enabling visit time on recently closed tab or history entries of the options page

options_tab_count.description: Label of a slider controlling maximum number of shown closed tabs on the main popup page (min 0, max 25)

options_history_count.description: Label of a slider controlling maximum number of shown history entries on the main  popup page (min 0, max 50)

options_expand_folders.description: Label of a check-box controlling whether windows should be automatically expanded, displaying all containing closed tabs within them

options_prefer_select.message: Prefer selecting existing tabs rather than creating duplicates
options_prefer_select.description: Label of a check-box controlling the behavior of opening links. If checked extension will try to select existing tabs with matching URL, rather than creating new ones

options_lang.description: Label of a select field controlling the language of the extension

options_theme.description: Label of a select field controlling the theme of the extension

options_dark_mode.description: Label of a select field controlling the dark/light mode of the extension

options_animate.description: Label of a select field enabling animations of the extension

options_about.description: Label of a button opening extension's homepage

hide_domain_from_title.message: Hide domain names in titles, ex. " - Wikipedia" suffix from wikipedia.com
hide_domain_from_title.description: Label of a checkbox responsible for the option controlling removing domain names from tabs. ex. Wikipedia
